snippet: The Rio Grande Valley Sector of the Texas border with Mexico has become the most active site of illegal crossing attempts, with 55 percent more apprehensions so far this fiscal year than during the same period last year.
lead_paragraph: The Rio Grande Valley Sector of the Texas border with Mexico has become the most active site of illegal crossing attempts, with 55 percent more apprehensions so far this fiscal year than during the same period last year.

headline.seo: Illegal Crossings Along the Texas Border
headline.main: Illegal Crossings Along the Texas Border
